section.p: After calling this method, you can listen for the corresponding events in the object and obtain data through . Depending on your project needs, you can add multiple listeners for the same event.

plentry.pd: The name of the target event to listen for. See .

The callback function for eventType. Take adding a listener for as an example:const onRecorderStateChanged = (state: RecorderState, reason: RecorderReasonCode) => {}; engine.addListener('onRecorderStateChanged', onRecorderStateChanged);
